data.name: AppName
data.comment: Application display name

data.name: Unknown
data.comment: Generic unknown status text

data.name: Error
data.comment: Generic error label

data.name: Success
data.comment: Generic success label

data.name: Loading
data.comment: Generic loading indicator text

data.name: Saving
data.comment: Generic saving indicator text

data.comment: Cancel button text

data.comment: Save button text

data.comment: Delete button text

data.comment: Refresh button text

data.name: ServiceManagement_PortValidation
data.comment: Validation message for invalid port number

data.name: ServiceManagement_SavingConfig
data.comment: InfoBar message while saving configuration

data.name: ServiceManagement_ConfigSavedSuccess
data.value: Configuration saved successfully. Restart the service for these settings to be applied.
data.comment: Success message after saving configuration

data.name: ServiceManagement_ConfigSavedWarning
data.value: Saved to UI, but could not find Service config file. Service may not be updated.
data.comment: Warning when service config file was not found

data.name: ServiceManagement_ConfigSaveError
data.comment: Error message when saving configuration fails. {0} = error message

data.name: ServiceManagement_ConfigUpdateFailed
data.value: Saved to UI settings, but failed to update Service config file: {0}. Try running as Administrator.
data.comment: Error when service config update fails. {0} = error message

data.name: ServiceManagement_InvalidPort
data.comment: Error message for invalid port. {0} = validation message

data.name: ServiceManagement_StartingService
data.comment: InfoBar message while starting service

data.name: ServiceManagement_ServiceStarted
data.comment: Success message after starting service

data.name: ServiceManagement_StartServiceFailed
data.comment: Error prefix when starting service fails

data.name: ServiceManagement_StoppingService
data.comment: InfoBar message while stopping service

data.name: ServiceManagement_ServiceStopped
data.comment: Success message after stopping service

data.name: ServiceManagement_StopServiceFailed
data.comment: Error prefix when stopping service fails

data.name: ServiceManagement_RestartingService
data.comment: InfoBar message while restarting service

data.name: ServiceManagement_ServiceRestarted
data.comment: Success message after restarting service

data.name: ServiceManagement_RestartServiceFailed
data.comment: Error message when restarting service fails. {0} = error message

data.name: ServiceManagement_InstallingService
data.comment: InfoBar message while installing service

data.name: ServiceManagement_ServiceInstalled
data.value: Service installed successfully. You can now start it.
data.comment: Success message after installing service

data.name: ServiceManagement_InstallServiceFailed
data.comment: Error message when installing service fails. {0} = error output

data.name: ServiceManagement_InstallCancelled
data.comment: Message when user cancels installation

data.name: ServiceManagement_InstallError
data.comment: Error message for service installation exception. {0} = error message

data.name: ServiceManagement_InvalidExePath
data.value: Please provide a valid executable path.
data.comment: Validation message for empty/invalid service executable path

data.name: ServiceManagement_UninstallingService
data.comment: InfoBar message while uninstalling service

data.name: ServiceManagement_ServiceUninstalled
data.comment: Success message after uninstalling service

data.name: ServiceManagement_UninstallServiceFailed
data.comment: Error message when uninstalling service fails. {0} = error output

data.name: ServiceManagement_UninstallCancelled
data.comment: Message when user cancels uninstallation

data.name: ServiceManagement_UninstallError
data.comment: Error message for service uninstallation exception. {0} = error message

data.name: ServiceManagement_SendingCommand
data.comment: InfoBar message when sending HTTP command. {0} = command, {1} = URL

data.name: ServiceManagement_CommandSuccess
data.comment: Success message after command sent. {0} = command name

data.name: ServiceManagement_CommandUnauthorized
data.value: Command failed with Unauthorized. Check your secret is correct.
data.comment: Error message when command returns 401

data.name: ServiceManagement_CommandFailed
data.comment: Error message when command fails. {0} = status code, {1} = content

data.name: ServiceManagement_ConnectionFailed
data.value: Connection failed: {0}. Ensure the service is running.
data.comment: Error message when HTTP connection fails. {0} = error message

data.name: ServiceManagement_ElevatedProcessFailed
data.value: Failed to start elevated process. User may have cancelled UAC prompt.
data.comment: Error when UAC elevation fails or is cancelled

data.name: ServiceManagement_ProcessStartFailed
data.comment: Error when process fails to start

data.name: ServiceManagement_ElevatedCommandError
data.comment: Error when elevated command throws. {0} = error message

data.name: Dashboard_ConnectingToService
data.comment: Status message while connecting via IPC

data.name: Dashboard_CannotConnect
data.value: Cannot connect to service. Is it running?
data.comment: Error message when IPC connection fails

data.name: Dashboard_LastUpdated
data.comment: Status showing last refresh time. {0} = timestamp

data.name: Dashboard_ServiceError
data.comment: Error message from IPC. {0} = error message

data.name: QuickActions_Sending
data.comment: Log message when sending command. {0} = command, {1} = URL

data.name: QuickActions_Success
data.comment: Log message on success. {0} = status code

data.name: QuickActions_Failed
data.comment: Log message on failure. {0} = status code

data.name: AppCatalog_LoadingApps
data.comment: Status message while loading app catalog

data.name: AppCatalog_LoadedApps
data.comment: Status after loading apps. {0} = count

data.name: AppCatalog_LoadFailed
data.comment: Error when loading apps fails. {0} = error message

data.name: AppCatalog_SavingApp
data.comment: Status while saving an app

data.name: AppCatalog_SavedApp
data.comment: Success message after saving app. {0} = app name

data.name: AppCatalog_SaveFailed
data.comment: Error when saving app fails. {0} = error message

data.name: AppCatalog_RequiredFields
data.value: Slot, Name, and Path are required.
data.comment: Validation message for missing required fields

data.name: AppCatalog_DeletingApp
data.comment: Status while deleting an app. {0} = app name

data.name: AppCatalog_DeletedApp
data.comment: Success message after deleting app. {0} = app name

data.name: AppCatalog_DeleteFailed
data.comment: Error when deleting app fails. {0} = error message

data.name: AppCatalog_LaunchingApp
data.comment: Status while launching an app. {0} = app name

data.name: AppCatalog_LaunchedApp
data.comment: Success message after launching app. {0} = app name

data.name: AppCatalog_LaunchFailed
data.comment: Error when launching app fails. {0} = error message

data.name: AppCatalog_LaunchCancelled
data.comment: Message when user cancels UAC prompt

data.name: AppCatalog_AppDisabled
data.comment: Message when trying to launch disabled app. {0} = app name

data.name: AppCatalog_NoPathConfigured
data.comment: Message when app has no path. {0} = app name

data.name: AppCatalog_PathNotFound
data.comment: Message when app path doesn't exist. {0} = path

data.name: AppCatalog_ReorderingApps
data.comment: Status while reordering apps

data.name: AppCatalog_ReorderedApps
data.comment: Success message after reordering apps

data.name: AppCatalog_ReorderFailed
data.comment: Error when reordering apps fails. {0} = error message

data.name: Settings_ThemeLight
data.comment: Light theme option

data.name: Settings_ThemeDark
data.comment: Dark theme option

data.name: Settings_ThemeSystem
data.comment: System default theme option
